description: wonderful implementation
App will no longer launch, nor will it uninstall

In Ubuntu 18.04 in which I first installed it, it worked perfectly and it was quite addicting too. Now that I upgraded to 20.04 it downloads and installs though when I start a new game the puzzle is empty. Also, I can't gemerate a new puzzle, the app just freezes for eternity.

This has replaced Kpat as my favorite solitaire game. Normally these kinds of games bore me, but the implementation is so good that I'm hooked. Benefits include:

- A large choice of Sudoku variations
- Easy and intuitive interface
- Several 'skins'
- Hints
- Solver

on regular sudoku diabolical and unlimited are easy but on killer sudoku theres no way of winning on unlimited without randomly guessing, on diabolical its still farely easy if you know how to play most these puzzle games are rigged so the machine always wins
Pretty good. One simple bug I noticed however, is that if you restart the game it doesn't reset the clock.

Many settings can be changed and many settings must be changed. 

Better defaults may make this app more attracted to folks that don't want to trek the settings. Once I got into the settings, I found that all the bits I didn't like could be changed. That was good, but I really didn't like many defaults (too busy color theme, bad shortcut keys, and so on). At least it's flexible.
summary: Good sudoku game but UI defaults could be better

Love this game. The ability to set difficulty is good.

All of the skins it comes with are too noisy, it doesn't mark off the numbers once you find them all, and it would be really helpful if there was an option to highlight the number on the board when you select it to enter. If there's a way to change any of this in the settings or get more skins, I haven't figured it out yet, which would mean it wasn't very intuitive of an interface. It's a strong C for a grade.
as of May 2023.
Simple and good to play.

Das Spiel hat einen braunen Hintergrund und goldfarbene Feldbegrenzungen. Die eigenen Felder sind etwas dunkler als die vorgegebenen. Wenn man versehentlich eine falsche Ziffer setzt, leuchtet diese sofort in Rot. Das gleicht ein wenig aus, dass man keine möglichen Zahlen notieren kann. Wenn man nur die Zahlen setzt, die von der Logik her sicher sind, kommt man tatsächlich zum Ziel. Ich habe bisher nur das reguläre und voreingestellte Spiel probiert. Man kann aber sogar in 3D spielen, was ich vielleicht irgendwann ausprobieren werde. Aktuell geht es mir nur um die grundsätzlichen Möglichkeiten des Basis-Spiels, das gut funktioniert und wirklich Spaß macht beim Spielen. Wirklich gut gelungen!
Von dieser Anwendung halte ich sogar eine ganze Menge! ... geschmackvoll ... umfangreich ... praktisch ... quadratisch! ... macht dings, Spaß ... ... ...

Grand choix de variante de jeux.
Ergonomie pratique.
Visuels agréable.
summary: Le meilleur jeu de sudoku que je connaisse
